titles.title: Mountains to Sound Greenway National Heritage Area Act
Mountains to Sound Greenway National Heritage Area Act
A bill to establish the Mountains to Sound Greenway National Heritage Area in the State of Washington.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 478.

bill.summary:
Mountains to Sound Greenway National Heritage Area Act
This bill establishes the Mountains to Sound Greenway National Heritage Area in the state of Washington. The Mountains to Sound Greenway Trust is designated as the local coordinating entity for the heritage area, which shall prepare and submit a management plan for it.
